content.title: Wie zijn wij?
content.description: Het is opgericht door vrijwilligers uit verschillende in Nederland wonende beroepsgroepen die zich inzetten voor de rechtsstaat, democratie en mensenrechten.

content.title: Onze Visie
content.description: Als mensenrechtenschendingen openbaar worden gemaakt, zullen schendingen afnemen of eindigen.

content.title: Onze missie
content.description: Het delen met het publiek van accurate informatie over mensenrechtenschendingen in de wereld en de daaruit voortvloeiende represailles.

content.title: Who are we?
content.description: It was founded by volunteers from various professions living in the Netherlands who support the rule of law, democracy and human rights.

content.title: Our Vision
content.description: As human rights violations are made public, violations will decrease or end.

content.title: Our Mission
content.description: To share with the public accurate information on human rights violations occurring in the world and the resulting victimisation.

content.title: Biz kimiz?
content.description: Hukukun üstünlüğünü, demokrasi ve insan haklarını destekleyen, Hollanda’da yaşayan değişik meslek sahibi gönüllüler tarafından kurulmuştur.

content.title: Vizyonumuz
content.description: İnsan hakları ihlalleri kamuoyuna paylaşıldıkça ihlaller azalacak veya sona erecektir.

content.title: Misyonumuz
content.description: Dünyada meydana gelen insan hakları ihlallerini, bundan dolayı oluşan mağduriyetler konusundaki doğru bilgiyi kamuoyuyla paylaşmak.
